info.text: It's beutiful isn't it? Its the Adrenal Gland. Personally I spent most of my time at the Hypothalamus gland, but this one is cool too.
I'll never get sick of staring at this gland. . . Y'know, the major organs of the endocrine system are glands, which
include the hypothalamus, the pituitary, the thyroid, the adrenal, the pancreas, the ovaries, and the testes.
These glands serve to produce hormones  that control metabolism, reproduction, and the growth and development of the body.
You're a nice kid, I'll give you free guidance over to the Kidneys.
